deploy.startCommand: /bin/sh -c "set -e; MODE=${RAILWAY_RUNTIME_MODE:-web}; export SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI=${SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI:-${DATABASE_URL:-}}; if [ -z \"$SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: set SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI or DATABASE_URL'; exit 1; fi; if [ \"$MODE\" = \"worker\" ]; then echo 'Runtime mode: worker'; exec python -m app.worker_daemon; else echo 'Runtime mode: web'; if [ \"${RUN_MIGRATIONS_ON_STARTUP:-0}\" = \"1\" ]; then echo 'Running migrations...'; ATTEMPTS=${MIGRATION_MAX_ATTEMPTS:-10}; DELAY=${MIGRATION_RETRY_DELAY_SECONDS:-3}; N=1; until alembic upgrade head; do if [ \"$N\" -ge \"$ATTEMPTS\" ]; then echo \"Migration failed after ${ATTEMPTS} attempts\"; exit 1; fi; echo \"Migration attempt ${N}/${ATTEMPTS} failed, retrying in ${DELAY}s...\"; N=$((N+1)); sleep \"$DELAY\"; done; fi; exec python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-8000}; fi"
